metadata.subject: Fwd: Lesley: Please deliver to Jeffrey

organizations: New York City Board of Education

relationships.description: Epstein made gifts/donations to Bard College through his foundation
Epstein's foundation provided critical funding to BHSEC schools
Groff appears to be forwarding correspondence to Epstein

analysis.purpose: To forward a thank you message and positive press coverage about Epstein's educational philanthropy
analysis.significance: Shows Epstein's philanthropic activities in education and positive media coverage of his foundation's work

notable_quotes: Thank you for your gifts to Bard College. Every dollar is deeply appreciated.
A group of unique public high schools... have received critical funding from science investor, Jeffrey Epstein and his foundation
95% of BHSEC graduates attend college. In July 2009, President Obama... cited the schools as a role model for the nation

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present in this document

illegal_activity.description: Document contains forwarded positive press coverage about Epstein's philanthropic activities, not first-hand illegal activity

details: PR Newswire article about Epstein's educational philanthropy

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a PR Newswire article that was publicly distributed, describing Epstein's philanthropic support for education

analysis.summary: Lesley Groff forwards an email from Charles Stevenson thanking Jeffrey Epstein for his gifts to Bard College, along with a PR Newswire article highlighting Epstein's foundation's critical funding for Bard High School Early College schools that were cited by President Obama as educational role models.
